item.title: No Time To Die - Billie Eilish - Ukulele Play Along
item.description:
Ukulele play along / Tutorial
No Time To Die - Billie Eilish From the James Bond Film
Using the chords: A Am B7 Cmaj7 Em
Suggested Strum Pattern: D D D DU or single strums You can be quite flexible with the strumming as it is slow
If you prefer, try playing some of the Am and Cmaj7 chords with your 1st finger to make it easier to move to the Em and B7 chords
Website: http://ukulele.wales/ Ukulele Wales Channel: http://www.youtube.com/c/UkuleleWales T-Shirts & Merch: https:https://www.redbubble.com/people/ukulaliens/shop
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Cavetown - This Is Home
item.description:
Ukulele play along
This Is Home - Cavetown
Using the chords: A C Cm Cmaj7 Em G
Suggested Strum Pattern: D D DU / DU D DU D or D DU DU DU You can be quite flexible with the strumming, just keep it very light.
Website: http://ukulele.wales/ Ukulele Wales Channel: http://www.youtube.com/c/UkuleleWales T-Shirts & Merch: https:https://www.redbubble.com/people/ukulaliens/shop
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Francesca Battistelli - Heaven Everywhere - Key of C
item.description:

Chords used: C, C6, Cmaj7, F, G, Am7, Am
As performed by Francesca Battistelli

item.title: Post Malone - Circles - Baritone Ukulele
item.description:
Circles by Post Malone. Chords used: C, Cmaj7, F, and Fm. For educational use. Verse 2 has been removed to make it school friendly.
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: Julie Andrews - My Favorite Things - Baritone Ukulele - Key of Dm, EM
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for DGBE Ukulele.
Chords used: Dm, Bbmaj7, Gm, C7, F, Bb, A7, D, G, G7, Em, Cmaj7, Am, D7, C, B7, E, A, D6
As performed by Julie Andrews in “The Sound of Music”

item.title: Billie Eilish - come out and play - Key of C
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Come Out And Play - Billie Eilish
Using the chords: Am C Cmaj7 Dm Em F G G7
Suggested Strum Patterns: Single strums or D DU D DU (slow)
Website: http://ukulele.wales/ Ukulele Wales Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQxNRbyi3i4Nvqpo55bWBkg T-Shirts & Merch: https:https://www.redbubble.com/people/ukulaliens/shop
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Steven Universe - We Are the Crystal Gems - Baritone Ukulele
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for DGBE Ukulele. Keys of F & G.
Chords Used: F, A7, Bb, C, Bbm, Gm7, Am7, Bbm7, E7, Am, Dm, G, Cmaj7, D7, C7, B7, Cm, Em, Gmaj7
As performed on Steven Universe
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/pdzcOAduI8E
